Control Name: Identifies and Manages the Inventory of Information Assets—The entity identifies, inventories, classifies, and manages information assets.

control_attributes.Control: Identifies and Manages the Inventory of Information Assets—The entity identifies, inventories, classifies, and manages information assets.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC6.1 The entity implements logical access security software, infrastructure, and architectures over protected information assets to protect them from security events to meet the entity’s objectives
